<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('è´¦å·ï¼š');
var a = 0;
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('username')) {
        Login();
    }
    java.put("mw-sign", cache.get("mw-sign"));
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) { 
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('âœ£ã€' + Account + 'ã€‘âœ£', '', 1, 1, false));
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("mw-sign", signdate);
        exploreUrl.push(explore(signdate + 'âœ”ï¸', '', 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('æˆ‘çš„æ”¶è—', `{{Get('url')}}/getfavors?page={{page-1}}&showOnlyUpdated=-1&isEnd=-1&isFullVersion=-1&order=0&order_type=0&folder_id=0`, 1, 0.25, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('æµè§ˆå†å²', `{{Get('url')}}/getHistory?page={{page-1}}&showOnlyUpdated=-1&isEnd=-1&isFullVersion=-1`, 1, 0.25, false));
        a = 4;
    }
}
Full = `{{get('full',Get('s'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
Host = `{{Get('p')}}`;
if(Get('t') > 0) {
    title = 'âœ£ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€  âœ£  æ ‡ç­¾  âœ£  ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€ã€€âœ£';

    Gender = get('gender',Get('o'));

    var Url = Get('url') + '/booklist?gender=' + Gender;
    var html = java.ajax(Url);

        cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));

    }
    var kind = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select('.panel-tag');
    for (i in kind) {
        url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?tag=${kind[i].attr('data-val')}&gender=${Gender}${Full}${End}&area=${Area}&sort=${Sort}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
    BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
    for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
       exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
    }
} else {
    title = [
        'æœ€æ–°','æœ€æ—§','æ”¶è—','æ–°æ¼«',
        'æœ€æ–°','æœ€æ—§','æ”¶è—','æ–°æ¼«',

let domain = "."; function addOptions(url, options) { let headers = { Referer: baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/,"") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { headers.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, headers); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function toImg(url, func, options) { let generateImgTag = (u) => ``; let generateHtml = (u, i, t) => typeof func == "function" ? generateImgTag(func(u, i, t)) : generateImgTag(u); return Array.isArray(url) ? url.map(generateHtml).join("\n") : generateHtml(url.toString()); } function load(urls) { for (i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) { let response = java.ajax(urls[i] + 'User_Activation.json'); if (JSON.stringify(response).includes("qyyuapi")){ return [response, urls[i]]; } } throw "Error: æ‰€æœ‰é“¾æ¥ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥"; } function parseKey(jsUrl) { let jsBaseUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/" ]; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/manwa.js", "plugins/evalPacker.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js", ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get("decodeObfuscator"); if (!jsBaseUrl || !java.ajax(jsBaseUrl)) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; cache.put("decodeObfuscator", jsBaseUrl); } String.prototype.toAbsUrl = function() { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(this) ? this : jsBaseUrl.concat(this); }; function loadJS(urls) { return jsBaseUrl && urls.map(url => script(java.importScript(url.toAbsUrl()))).join("\n") || ""; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; let key = JSON.parse(java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"))[0]; return key; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1'); var mwsign = cache.get("mw-sign") || ''; java.put("mw-sign", mwsign); if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("mw-sign"))) { var signdate = sign(); cache.put("mw-sign", signdate); } let DEBUG = 0; let origin = Get('url'); let chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/); if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) { cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1])); } let imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src) .select(".content-img") .toArray() .map(v => { let dataRsrc = v.attr("data-r-src"); return dataRsrc ? dataRsrc : ""; }) .filter(v => v !== ""); if (DEBUG) { imgs.splice(1); } var result = toImg(imgs, null, { headers: { origin: origin } }); result; } else { if (baseUrl.includes('/json/')) { '
'; } else { '
'; } }

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('html.js')){
    cookie.removeCookie(Get('url'));
    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"éªŒè¯").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    var Date = String(java.timeFormat(new Date().getTime())).replace(/\d+\/(.*)\s.*/, '$1');
    var mwsign = cache.get("mw-sign") || '';
    java.put("mw-sign", mwsign);
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0 && !Date.includes(cache.get("mw-sign"))) {
        var signdate = sign();
        cache.put("mw-sign", signdate);
    }
    if (baseUrl.includes("/get")) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).books;
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].book_name;
            kind = list[i].end;
            latest = list[i].last_chapter_name + 'ã€”' + list[i].last_time + 'ã€•';
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': latest,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].cover_url,
                'url': Get('url') + '/book/' + list[i].book_id + '/?img_host=' + Get('p')
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = JSON.parse(next).books;
        if (!list[0] || !next_1[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    } else {
        var list = java.getElements('.manga-list-2 li');
        var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = $('.manga-list-2-title');
            intro = $('.manga-list-2-tip').replace(/å…è´¹.*/, '');
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].select('.manga-list-2-cover-img').attr('src'),
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.manga-list-2-cover a').attr('href') + '/?img_host=' + Get('p')
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.manga-list-2 li')[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ](|\s)ç¬¬.*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]/, '$1').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*ç¬¬.*(\d+).*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[è¯è©±ç« å›æœŸ])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ').replace(/\s\d{4}\s\d{2}\s\d{2}$/, '');
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? title + 'ã€”' + date + 'ã€•' : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].attr('href') + '/?img_host=' + Get('p')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/search?keyword=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&img_host=' + Get('p') + '&page={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>
